home.You can send money anywhere with followi: You can send money anywhere with following four easy steps
home.Our FIRM promise is to save you time and: Our FIRM promise is to save you time and money
home.XYPAY client disclaimer: This service is enabled by XYPAY Technologies Inc (“XYPAY”). XYPAY is a financial technology company, not a bank. The Banking Services are provided by Bank, member FDIC.
home.Send money safely and quickly with XYPAY: Send money safely and quickly with XYPAY.
home.Transfer money to your recipient instant: Transfer money to your recipient instantly with desired payment methods.
home.Deposit money to your recipient bank acc: Deposit money to your recipient bank account or mobile money account.
home.We offer you the best exchange rate for: We offer you the best exchange rate for every transaction.
home.Transfer money safely and securely throu: Transfer money safely and securely through our system.
home.Our system works to make your life easie: Our system works to make your life easier. Sign up XYPAY today and benefit from instant, fast and secure money transfer services.
home.Sign up today and enjoy the offer: Sign up today and enjoy the offer.
home.It’s simple Our system works quickly and: It’s simple. Our system works quickly and efficiently to transfer your money to Sierra Leone and Guinea.
home.You can use XYPAY in 4 simple steps:: You can use XYPAY in 4 simple steps:
home.Enter the send amount and calculate with: Enter the send amount and calculate with exchange rate.
home.Select existing recipient or add a new r: Select existing recipient or add a new recipient.
home.Add payment method either Debit card or: Add payment method either Debit card or Bank account.
home.Review the payment details and send the: Review the payment details and send the money.
home.The XYPAY Support Center is here to assi: The XYPAY Support Center is here to assist you with any inquiries or questions you may have regarding our services. We are dedicated to providing comprehensive support and guidance.

sender.Account Delete Message: Please note that after deleting your XYPAY account, you will not be able to sign up again with the same email and phone number or retrieve your personal and transaction information from this platform. Upon receiving your request, the deletion process will take upto 2 business days. Please refer to the <1>User Agreement & Privacy Policy</1> for more details. If you want to proceed with the request, please confirm.
sender.Account Delete Request Success Message: We have received your request for account deletion. The deletion process can take upto 2 business days. You will receive a confirmation email once the request has been processed.
sender.Account Deletion Process Message: Your account is under the deletion process as per your request. You won’t be able to perform any activity until deletion. If the account deletion request was not initiated by you, please contact customer support at <1>+23231091576</1> / <3>hello@XYPAY.com</3>.
sender.We require you to verify your contact be: We require you to verify your contact before making any more transactions. Please click <1>here</1> to verify your contact.
sender.If this is your first time here, please: If this is your first time here, please proceed by providing the following information.
sender.Rest of your essential identifying infor: Rest of your essential identifying information
sender.You have to do this only once We will re: You have to do this only once. We will remember your details next time.
sender.We will use your date of birth to verify: We will use your date of birth to verify your identity and ensure your security.
sender.Please select the Country you live in: Please select the Country you live in
sender.Loading your personal details Please wai: Loading your personal details. Please wait.
sender.Collecting your limit information Please: Collecting your limit information. Please wait.
sender.Limit info: All customers are categorized under three (3) transaction limits based on the amount they can send. If you want to transfer more funds your current transaction limit allows, then you will need to a higher transaction limit. To upgrade, you will be required to provide additional information.
sender.Upgrade limit to send more money: Upgrade transaction limit to send more money.
sender.To send more money, upgrade your limit: To send more money, upgrade your transaction limit

sender.Verification Warning: Your account is under review. You will only be able to request an upgrade to your transaction limit once your account is VERIFIED. Please contact customer support for further information.
sender.User suspended message: Your account has been suspended. Please contact customer support for more details.
sender.Bank Relogin Message: You are required to re-login to your bank account. Please click on the <1></1> icon next to the bank name below and login.
sender.Kyc review pending status warning: Your account is under review. You will only be able to request transaction once your account is VERIFIED. Please contact customer support for further information.

review.Please review to make sure everything is: Please review to make sure everything is correct before proceeding.
review.If you have any complaint to any aspect: If you have any complaint to any aspect of money transmission activities conducted through this service, you may contact:
review.Your bank will now verify your payment u: Your bank will now verify your payment using 3D secure. Please wait while the transaction is processed and do NOT click the “Back button” or close the browser window.
review.terms: I authorize <1>Golden Money Transfer (GMT)</1> via <1>XYPAY</1> which is a Marketing Affiliate of <1>Golden Money Transfer (GMT)</1> to debit the bank account indicated in this web form for the noted amount on today's date. I will  not dispute <1>Golden Money Transfer (GMT)</1> debiting my checking/savings account, so long as the transaction  corresponds to the terms indicated in this web form. (Note: The funds for your money transfer will be  debited from your bank account by <1>Golden Money Transfer (GMT)</1> via Tabapay. Click <15>here</15> for details.).
review.terms prabhu: I authorize <1>PRABHU GROUP INC</1> via <1>XYPAY</1> which is a Marketing Affiliate of <1>PRABHU GROUP INC</1> to debit the bank account indicated in this web form for the noted amount on today's date. I will  not dispute <1>PRABHU GROUP INC</1> debiting my checking/savings account, so long as the transaction  corresponds to the terms indicated in this web form. (Note: The funds for your money transfer will be  debited from your bank account by <1>PRABHU GROUP INC</1> via Tabapay. Click <15>here</15> for details.).

review.Your request cannot be processed We were: Your request cannot be processed. We were unable to verify your Debit Card Information. Please try a different Debit Card or contact XYPAY customer service at
